campo.campo: case when length(z01_cgccpf) = 11 then 'Fisica' when length(z01_cgccpf) = 14 then 'Juridico' else 'Indefinido' end
campo.label: tipo

campo.campo: case when z01_nomecomple is not null then z01_nomecomple else z01_nome end
campo.label: nome

campo.campo: (select db125_codigosistema from db_config inner join cadendermunicipio on munic = db72_descricao inner join cadendermunicipiosistema on db125_cadendermunicipio = db72_sequencial and db125_db_sistemaexterno = 4 inner join cadenderestado on db72_cadenderestado = db71_sequencial inner join cadenderpais on db71_cadenderpais = db70_sequencial inner join cadenderpaissistema on db70_sequencial = db135_db_cadenderpais and db135_db_sistemaexterno = 3 where prefeitura = 't')
campo.label: cod_ibge

campo.campo: (select db72_descricao from db_config inner join cadendermunicipio on munic = db72_descricao inner join cadendermunicipiosistema on db125_cadendermunicipio = db72_sequencial and db125_db_sistemaexterno = 4 inner join cadenderestado on db72_cadenderestado = db71_sequencial inner join cadenderpais on db71_cadenderpais = db70_sequencial inner join cadenderpaissistema on db70_sequencial = db135_db_cadenderpais and db135_db_sistemaexterno = 3 where prefeitura = 't')
campo.label: munic

campo.campo: (select db71_sigla from db_config inner join cadendermunicipio on munic = db72_descricao inner join cadendermunicipiosistema on db125_cadendermunicipio = db72_sequencial and db125_db_sistemaexterno = 4 inner join cadenderestado on db72_cadenderestado = db71_sequencial inner join cadenderpais on db71_cadenderpais = db70_sequencial inner join cadenderpaissistema on db70_sequencial = db135_db_cadenderpais and db135_db_sistemaexterno = 3 where prefeitura = 't')
campo.label: uf

campo.campo: (select db135_codigo from db_config inner join cadendermunicipio on munic = db72_descricao inner join cadendermunicipiosistema on db125_cadendermunicipio = db72_sequencial and db125_db_sistemaexterno = 4 inner join cadenderestado on db72_cadenderestado = db71_sequencial inner join cadenderpais on db71_cadenderpais = db70_sequencial inner join cadenderpaissistema on db70_sequencial = db135_db_cadenderpais and db135_db_sistemaexterno = 3 where prefeitura = 't')
campo.label: cod_pais

campo.campo: (select db70_descricao from db_config inner join cadendermunicipio on munic = db72_descricao inner join cadendermunicipiosistema on db125_cadendermunicipio = db72_sequencial and db125_db_sistemaexterno = 4 inner join cadenderestado on db72_cadenderestado = db71_sequencial inner join cadenderpais on db71_cadenderpais = db70_sequencial inner join cadenderpaissistema on db70_sequencial = db135_db_cadenderpais and db135_db_sistemaexterno = 3 where prefeitura = 't')
campo.label: pais

campo.campo: case when (select q39_dtbaixa from isscadsimples left join isscadsimplesbaixa on q38_sequencial = q39_isscadsimples where q38_inscr = q138_inscr order by q38_sequencial desc limit 1) is null then 'Não' else 'Sim' end
campo.label: optante_simples_baixado

campo.campo: case when (select q38_sequencial from isscadsimples left join isscadsimplesbaixa on q38_sequencial = q39_isscadsimples where q38_inscr = q138_inscr order by q38_sequencial desc limit 1) is null then 'Não' else 'Sim' end
campo.label: optante_simples

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 1 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr )
campo.label: tipo_classificacao

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 2 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr )
campo.label: tipo_emissao

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 3 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr )
campo.label: subst_tributaria

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 4 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr)
campo.label: regime_tributario

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 5 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr)
campo.label: exigibilidade

campo.campo: (select db140_sequencial from issbasecaracteristica left join caracteristica on db140_sequencial = q138_caracteristica left join grupocaracteristica on db139_sequencial = db140_grupocaracteristica where db139_sequencial = 6 and issbase.q02_inscr = q138_inscr)
campo.label: incentivo_fiscal
